## DrawCircleTool class

绘制圆

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class DrawCircleTool extends DrawRectTool<DrawCircleToolOptions, DrawCircleToolEvents>
```

**Extends:** [DrawRectTool](./cesium.drawrecttool.md)<!-- -->&lt;[DrawCircleToolOptions](./cesium.drawcircletooloptions.md)<!-- -->, [DrawCircleToolEvents](./cesium.drawcircletoolevents.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Example

```ts
const tool = new DrawCircleTool(options)

tool.enable()

tool.eventBus.on('left-click', onLeftClick)
tool.eventBus.on('mouse-move', onMouseMove)
tool.eventBus.on('right-click', onRightClick)
tool.eventBus.on('left-dbclick', onLeftDBClick)
```

| Method                                                                       | Modifiers              | Description                                |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- | ------------------------------------------ |
| [clear()](./cesium.drawcircletool.clear.md)                                  |                        | 清空绘制结果，等待下轮绘制                 |
| [createLFloatArea()](./cesium.drawcircletool.createlfloatarea.md)            | <code>protected</code> | 创建拖拽圆                                 |

| [stop()](./cesium.drawcircletool.stop.md)                                    |                        | 传递本轮绘制结果，不再绘制，不清空绘制结果 |
| [validateArea()](./cesium.drawcircletool.validatearea.md)                    | <code>protected</code> | 校验圆                                     |
